text: Carlo Cardascio (born 6 November 1979 in Bari, Italy) is an Italian footballer who currently plays as a midfielder for Italian club Bisceglie in Serie D. ==References== ==External links== *Profile at Lega-Calcio.it Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Italian footballers Category:Italy youth international footballers Category:Serie A players Category:Serie B players Category:Serie C players Category:Serie D players Category:Belgian First Division A players Category:A.S.
